title: Error formatting named float type
body:
Before filing a bug, please check whether it has been fixed since
the latest release: run "hg pull -u" and retry what you did to
reproduce the problem.  Thanks.

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. 8g floatbug.go ; 8l -o floatbug floatbug.8
2. ./floatbug
3.

What is the expected output?
8.00

What do you see instead?
"in String()" repeated infinitely, followed by an out of memory error
"mmap: errno=0xc"

What is your $GOOS?  $GOARCH?
linux, 386

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
5f0934a5a409+ tip

Please provide any additional information below.
I believe this may be the same issue as discussed here (with associated code review that
I believe has been committed to trunk), but I'm not sure.

http://groups.google.com/group/golang-nuts/browse_thread/thread/861719325fb524d3
Attachments: 1. floatbug.go (237 bytes)
